comment: I didn't get all that. Maybe mine is defective. I just hear Bill Gates talking to me through my molars. At least I get good advice about using Windows now.

comment: Thanks! It's so cool to have the jab and so far I feel good, just a tiny bit of soreness on my arm.Thanks for the heads-up on the electronics. The fun part is now I can read minds, see the entire ultraviolet spectrum and feel the earth's magnetic field.
